front.title: A Presence Information Data Format - Location Object Extension for Triangulation Data

abstract.t: This document describes how a Presentity Agent (PA) provides a Location Information Server (LIS) with location specific measurement data it observes, for example - how many satellites are visible to a PA, and at what angle are each currently, to aid the LIS in determining geographically where the PA is. This is done within a Session Initiation Protocol subscription framework where the LIS subscribes to the PA for its measurement data. The LIS performs the location calculation, determining where the PA is.
